editor.fontFamily: XD Normal, Iosevka Custom, Input Mono, SFMono-UltraLight, SourceCodePro-Light, Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace
terminal.integrated.fontFamily: XD Normal, Iosevka Custom, Input Mono, SFMono-UltraLight, SourceCodePro-Light, Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace

textMateRules.name: Bananna yellow
scope: source.cpp meta.body meta.function.definition meta.body.function meta.template.call meta.qualified_type entity.name.type

code-runner.executorMap.cpp: builtin cd $dir; (ls makefile &>/dev/null) && make;(ls makefile &>/dev/null) || g++ -std=c++14 "$fileName" -o $fileNameWithoutExt && $dir$fileNameWithoutExt

python.formatting.yapfArgs: {based_on_style: chromium, indent_width: 4, column_limit: 999999, arithmetic_precedence_indication: true, dedent_closing_brackets: false, disable_ending_comma_heuristic: false, each_dict_entry_on_separate_line: true, join_multiple_lines: false, split_arguments_when_comma_terminated: true }

args.text: yapf '$currentFile' --style='{based_on_style: chromium, indent_width: 4, column_limit: 9, arithmetic_precedence_indication: true, dedent_closing_brackets: true, disable_ending_comma_heuristic: false, each_dict_entry_on_separate_line: false, join_multiple_lines: false, split_arguments_when_comma_terminated: true }' > .formatted.txt && mv .formatted.txt '$currentFile'

echo the current file is: $currentFile
echo the current folder is: $currentFolder

docker.images.label: RepositoryName
